long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension requires a Recrypt account. If you don't have one yet, you can sign up on the main website and try one free. Start sharing your business-critical information securely. Recrypt stores all of your indispensable company passwords in one place under one master password - and that's it. Keep track of your master password and Recrypt remembers the rest. Recrypt provides enterprise-level security and controls to share business-critical information. Protecting credentials within your business and in the cloud has never been so easy.
